mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE (PKID, PART_CODE, CASE_CODE, PART_APPROVER, APPROVE_TIME, COMMENT, APPROVE_COMMET) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partApprover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{approveCommet,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE
PKID,
PART_CODE,
CASE_CODE,
PART_APPROVER,
APPROVE_TIME,
COMMENT,
APPROVE_COMMET,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partApprover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{approveCommet,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_APPROVER = #{partApprover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVE_TIME = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
APPROVE_COMMET = #{approveCommet,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE set PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_APPROVER = #{partApprover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_TIME = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, APPROVE_COMMET = #{approveCommet,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(CASE_CODE) AS countJAS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE where datediff(month,Close_Time,getdate())=0 AND CASE_CODE IN( ( select CASE_CODE from sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE 1=1 AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )UNION( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1=1 AND PROCESSOR_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
)

SELECT CONVERT (CHAR(7), CREATE_TIME, 120) AS createTime, COUNT (CASE_CODE) AS countJDS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE datediff(MONTH, Close_Time, getdate()) = 0 AND CASE_CODE IN ( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_ID IN #{item} ) GROUP BY CONVERT (CHAR(7), CREATE_TIME, 120)

SELECT convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120) as createTime, COUNT(CASE_CODE) AS countJAS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE where datediff(month,Close_Time,getdate())=0 AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID IN #{item} GROUP BY convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120)
